thread.title: Hillary Clinton and Barack Obama 2012 election: She would 'never' run, top aide says in email
thread.title_full: Hillary Clinton and Barack Obama 2012 election: She would 'never' run, top aide says in email - POLITICO

author: Michael Hirsh
title: Hillary Clinton and Barack Obama 2012 election: She would 'never' run, top aide says in email
text:
Hillary Clinton would never run for president again, her chief of staff Cheryl Mills insisted in 2011, and people in her orbit would "have to know" that, according to an email chain in the latest release of Clinton's State Department emails. Mills forwarded to Clinton confidante Robert Barnett a POLITICO story on Sept. 8, 2011, that Quote: d former Vice President Dick Cheney remarking in an ABC interview that the secretary of state should run against President Barack Obama in 2012.
"Maybe if— the Obama record is bad enough— and these days it's not very good, given the shape of the economy maybe there will be enough ferment in the Democratic Party so that there will be a primary on their side," Cheney was Quote: d as saying.
Barnett responded to Mills' email that he had heard the same thing "from several people each day."
Emails show Clinton kept apprised of developments in Weiner scandal "Today, one came from a high school friend who is probably the most politically conservative person I know. There is going to be an avalanche," he wrote, and offered to help tamp down the speculation: "We should have a strategy for responding. Keep it out of State. Happy to help if you wish."
Mills' response: "Folks have to know she would never do it - I thought cheney was poking potus"
The chief of staff long opposed her boss seeking another presidential bid, as The Associated Press reported that she would say Clinton was "crazy" for considering it.
"Honestly, nine out of ten people who are not on the 'in' think she will. It is only going to build," Barnett wrote in the email, which Mills forwarded to Clinton. "So, we should have some strategy based upon, of course, her wishes."
